translation_providers.name: Lokalise
translation_providers.description:
Our native professional translators are experts in mobile app, software, e-learning, website, multimedia and game localization. Translations in over 90 languages are available.

Reach out for our translation managers in our in-web support chat. They will guide you through.

Lifetime quality guarantee applies.

Lokalise will not translate unlawful, abusive, pornographic, discriminatory or gambling-related content.
As soon as such content is found in the order for translation placed with Lokalise, the order is stopped, and the untranslated part is refunded. Please see more details in Section 7 "Prohibited Content" of Lokalise Terms.
